summary: My first try at modding, I give you Tanith a nord follower.
descriptionHtml:
Tanith is a basic companion wearing ebony armour, and an ebony sword, she can be found in the Drunken Huntsmen in Whiterun. She is spellsword and so is best when using a sword, so she will then use flames as a secondary attack. My first attempt at modding so I couldn't figure out how to change her hair or stats :-(
May update when I have learnt more :-)
author: HackedZeppelinKas110
